metadata.name: Holkira Pak 12 5 MG Tablet film coated

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: When used in combination with DB09297 and DB00503 as the fixed dose product Technivie Ombitasvir is indicated in combination with DB00811 for the treatment of patients with genotype 4 chronic hepatitis C virus HCV infection without cirrhosis L866 When used in combination with DB09297 DB00503 and DB09183 as the fixed dose product Viekira Pak Ombitasvir is indicated for the treatment of HCV genotype 1b and when combined with DB00811 for the treatment of HCV genotype 1a FDA Label

contraindications.disease: The most common adverse effects of Viekira Pak either in combination with or without DB00811 were pruritus nausea insomnia and asthenia FDA Label The most common adverse effects of Technivie with or without DB00811 were asthenia fatigue nausea insomnia and pruritus L866
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Ombitasvir is classified as a direct acting antiviral and acts against HCV to inhibit viral replication FDA Label
